ai-thag2.49:2.2_0: they cling to mind as self,
ai-thag2.49:2.4_0: and attained the ending of defilements.
ai-thag2.49:2.7_0: The fifth sub-chapter on making amends.
ai-thag2.49:3.2_0: and Brahmāli, the nativel of Dhamma.
ai-thag2.49:3.4_0: And you have no idiot like a coarse.
ai-thag2.49:3.5_0: The senior monk who relies on Vajjis,
ai-thag2.49:3.7_0: The Book of the Twos is finished.
ai-thag2.49:4.0_0: Then they pass away from that host of gods
ai-thag2.49:4.2_0: but eight on each and eight.
